title: dg expo /  NYC January 2016
desc: dg expo  /?NYC / 2 day exhibit + seminars FABRIC & TRIM SHOW offering LOW-MINIMUMS + STOCK This is a trade event not open to the public. A 2 day Textile & Trimmings exhibit for Designers, Small Manufacturers (producing Apparel, Accessories, Homefurnishings, other Sewn Products), plus Private Label Retailers, Fabric Stores, Event/Party Planners. Exhibitors are Wholesale Suppliers (including Mills, Converters, Importers, and Distributors) who have low minimums, and many have in-stock fabric and trims. Plus Seminars! Go to   www.dgexpo.net   for more information. ? EXHIBIT HALL DATES: ?   Wednesday & Thursday - January 20 & 21, 2016 EXHIBIT HALL HOURS: ?? Wednesday 10AM to 6:30PM Thursday 9:30AM to 6:00PM LOCATION: ?   New York City / Hotel Pennsylvania? 401 Seventh Avenue, 18th Floor / Penthouse,  Penntop Ballroom & Skytop Ballroom SEMINARS:  to be announced For more information?  go to  www.dgexpo.net  or write to   info@dgexpo.net ?   The show is FREE of charge to Attendees.? There is a fee to attend seminars.
